law.catch_line: Determination of maximum permissible school district revenue.
law.text: Notwithstanding any provisions of this chapter to the contrary, the tax rate on motor vehicles and trailers for the preceding year shall be applied to the preceding year's total valuation of such motor vehicles and trailers and the resulting amount added to the revenue from other tangible personal property for purposes of determining the maximum permissible school district revenue under KRS 160.470.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. V, sec. 441, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 371, sec. 6, effective January 1, 1981.
